data.title: Hotel with Shuttle to Newark Airport
data.meta_description: Our comfortable hotel with a shuttle to Newark Airport runs every half hour or upon request, giving you complete peace of mind. Book your visit with us today!
data.text: When you stay at our hotel with shuttle to Newark Airport, you will be ideally located to catch a flight – no matter the time of day. Our hotel offers a complimentary 24 hour shuttle to EWR Airport (Newark International Airport) – just a 5 minute drive away.
